NumericalData.Caveats:
For each telescope/ direction :
         *  FOV center in MSO - Geometric center of each field of view in MSO coordinates
         *  FOV center in IAU - Geometric center of each field of view in IAU Mars coordinates
         *  sun angle - Angle between the geometric center of each field of view and the direction of the sun 
         *  pitch angle - Angle between the geometric center of each field of view and the magnetic field direction averaged over the 32 second interval
         *  nadir angle - Angle between the geometric center of each field of view and the nadir direction, i.e. towards the center of Mars 
         *  fraction mars - Fraction of each field of view taken up by Mars 
         
       And :  mars : fraction sky - Fraction of the sky filled by the disk of Mars

Parameter.Name: forward : FOV center in MSO
Parameter.Description: Geometric center of telecope 2 forward field of view in MSO coordinates

Parameter.Name: rear : FOV center in MSO
Parameter.Description: Geometric center of telecope 2 rear field of view in MSO coordinates

Parameter.Name: forward : FOV center in IAU
Parameter.Description: Geometric center of telecope 2 forward field of view in IAU Mars coordinates

Parameter.Name: rear : FOV center in IAU
Parameter.Description: Geometric center of telecope 2 rear field of view in IAU MARS coordinates

Parameter.Name: forward : sun angle
Parameter.Description: Angle between the geometric center of telescope 2 forward field of view and the direction of the sun

Parameter.Name: rear : sun angle
Parameter.Description: Angle between the geometric center of telescope 2 rear field of view and the direction of the sun

Parameter.Name: forward : pitch angle
Parameter.Description: Angle between the geometric center of telescope 2 forward field of view and the magnetic field direction averaged over the 32 second interval

Parameter.Name: rear : pitch angle
Parameter.Description: Angle between the geometric center of telescope 2 rear field of view and the magnetic field direction averaged over the 32 second interval

Parameter.Name: forward : nadir angle
Parameter.Description: Angle between the geometric center of telescope 2 forward field of view and the nadir direction, i.e. towards the center of Mars

Parameter.Name: rear : nadir angle
Parameter.Description: Angle between the geometric center of telescope 2 rear field of view and the nadir direction, i.e. towards the center of Mars

Parameter.Name: forward : fraction mars
Parameter.Description: Fraction of telescope 2 forward field of view taken up by Mars

Parameter.Name: rear : fraction mars
Parameter.Description: Fraction of telescope 2 rear field of view taken up by Mars

Parameter.Name: mars :fraction sky
Parameter.Description: Fraction of the sky filled by the disk of Mars
